fields.name: NB_Decleration
fields.fieldText: N.B.  Hereinafter the Proposer and its subsidiaries shall be known as the “Company.”

fields.name: add_Subsidiaries_question
fields.fieldText: Is there Subsidiaries under the Policyholder to add?

fields.name: Number_of_subsidiaries_to_add
fields.fieldText: Number of subsidiaries to add

fields.name: Additional_Information
fields.fieldText: Additional Information

fields.name: File_upload_msg
fields.fieldText:
1. Please attach an updated Cap Table
  2. If required, please attach most updated financial reports.
  3. If required, please send the attached financial appendix fully answered, signed and dated.

fields.name: Claims_and_Circumstances
fields.fieldText: Claims and Circumstances

fields.name: C_Q_1
fields.fieldText: Is the U.S. SEC or U.S. IRS presently investigation or requesting information from the Company or any director or officer of the Company?

fields.name: C_Q_1_1
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: C_Q_2
fields.fieldText: Has there been or is there now pending any claims, actions or investigations against or involving any proposed insured (including but not limited to any director and or officer of any company)?

fields.name: C_Q_2_1
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: C_Q_3
fields.fieldText: Does any of the directors or officers of the company, the General Counsel (or equivalent person) of the company and the risk manager of the company have any knowledge or information of any act, error or omission which could reasonably give rise to a claim, investigation, or action under the proposed policy, except as follows: (Attach complete details)

fields.name: C_Q_3_1
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: Claim_alart
fields.fieldText: Please note that it is highly recommended to forward the Claims and Circumstances Questions above to all the Company's Directors and Officers before signing the proposal form

fields.name: Current_D_O_Insurance
fields.fieldText: Current D&O Insurance

fields.name: None_Current_D_O_Insurance
fields.fieldText: None Current D&O Insurance

fields.name: Current_D_O_Insurance_Decleration
fields.fieldText: Has the Company ever had any Insurer decline a proposal or cancel or refuse to renew a Directors' & Officers' Liability Insurance?

fields.name: please_provide_details
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: Declaration_msg
fields.fieldText: I declare on behalf of all insureds, after inquiry, that the statements and particulars in this supplemental proposal are true and no material facts have been misstated or suppressed. I agree that this proposal forms, any attachment, any information submitted therewith and any and all other information supplied or requested, shall form the basis of any Contract of Insurance effected thereon. All written statements and materials furnished to the insurer in conjunction with this application are hereby incorporated by reference into this application and made a part hereof. Signing this proposal does not bind the Policyholder to complete this insurance.

fields.name: Full_name_of_the_signer
fields.fieldText: Full name of the signer

fields.name: Title_of_the_signer
fields.fieldText: Title of the signer

fields.name: Sign_Date
fields.fieldText: Sign Date

fields.name: Employees
fields.fieldText: Employees

fields.name: Number_of_Employees_in_Israel
fields.fieldText: Number of Employees in Israel

fields.name: Number_of_Employees_in_USA
fields.fieldText: Number of Employees in USA

fields.name: Number_of_Employees_in_Canada
fields.fieldText: Number of Employees in Canada

fields.name: Number_of_Employees_in_Europe
fields.fieldText: Number of Employees in Europe

fields.name: Number_of_Employees_in_the_rest_of_the_World
fields.fieldText: Number of Employees in the rest of the World

fields.name: Total
fields.fieldText: Total

fields.name: Employee_Question
fields.fieldText: In the event that there was a major change in no. of employees and/or their geographical distribution please explain the reasons for such change

fields.name: Financials
fields.fieldText: Financials

fields.name: F_Q_1
fields.fieldText: Does the Company including each of its subsidiaries have enough cash to finance its operation for at least 6 months from the date of this form is signed?

fields.name: F_Q_1_1
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: F_Q_2
fields.fieldText: Does the company have a positive equity?

fields.name: F_Q_2_1
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: F_Q_3
fields.fieldText: Does the company including any of its subsidiaries in breach in any debts, covenants or loan agreement?

fields.name: F_Q_3_1
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: F_Q_4
fields.fieldText: What is the Total Asset of the company (Consolidate Figures)?

fields.name: F_Q_5
fields.fieldText: What is the company turnover (Consolidate Figures)?

fields.name: F_Q_6
fields.fieldText: What is the total turnover in North America?

fields.name: F_Q_7
fields.fieldText: Please state total gross assets in the United States

fields.name: F_Q_8
fields.fieldText: Please state total investments raised by the company since its establishment

fields.name: General_Information_title
fields.fieldText: General Information

fields.name: G_Q_1
fields.fieldText: During the last year has any acquisition or merger occurred involving the Policyholder or any subsidiary?

fields.name: G_Q_1_1
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: G_Q_2
fields.fieldText: Has the Company changed its external auditing firm in the past three years or have any plans to remove or replace its external auditor in the next 12 months?

fields.name: G_Q_2_1
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: G_Q_2_2
fields.fieldText: Is the policyholder publicly traded (equity or debt)? Or has any ADRs?

fields.name: G_Q_2_3
fields.fieldText: on which stock exchange?

fields.name: G_Q_3
fields.fieldText: Is the Company considering any acquisition, tender offer, merger, or public offering?

fields.name: G_Q_3_1
fields.fieldText: please provide details

fields.name: G_Q_4
fields.fieldText: Have any Directors and / or Executive Officers of the Policyholder or of any subsidiary of the Policyholder been replaced in the past 12 months?

fields.name: G_Q_4_1
fields.fieldText: please state: Title position of replaced D&Os

fields.name: G_Q_4_2
fields.fieldText: Please clarify why they were replaced?

fields.name: G_Q_4_3
fields.fieldText: Are there any open issues regarding the replacement?
